unit.name: Prince
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Archmage
unit.description: Magic: An Archmage is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Loremaster
unit.description: Magic: The model is a Level 3 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. May take up to 100p of magic items. Special Rules: Speed of Asuryan, Loremaster

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Mage
unit.description: Magic: A Mage is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Noble
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Spearman
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Martial Prowess, Anti-Cav (spear), Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Lothern Sea Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, bow and light armour. Special Rules: Martial Prowess, Anti-Cav (spear), Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Archer
unit.description: Equipment: Longbow. Special Rules: Martial Prowess, Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Silver Helm
unit.description: Mount: Barded Elven Steed. Equipment: Lance, light armour and shield, Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Ellyrian Reaver
unit.description: Mount: Elven Steed. Equipment: Spear and light armour. Special Rules: Light Cavalry, Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Dragon Prince of Caledor
unit.description: Mount: Barded Elven Steed. Equipment: Lance, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry, Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Phoenix Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Halberd and heavy armour. Special Rules: Stubborn, Fear, Block (halberd), Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Swordmaster of Hoeth
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Bladedancer, Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: White Lion of Chrace
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon, heavy armour and Lion Cloak. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Immune to Fear, Rank (1), Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Sister of Avelorn
unit.description: Equipment: Bow of Avelorn and light armour. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Shadow Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Longbow and light armour. Special Rules: Scout, Skirmish, Nagarythe Hatred, Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Tiranoc Chariot
unit.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 2 Crew, 2 Elven Steeds. Equipment: The crew is armed with spear and bow. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1), Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: White Lion Chariot
unit.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 2 White Lion Crew, 2 White Lions. Equipment: The crew is armed with great weapons. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1), Fear, Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Skycutter Chariot
unit.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 2 Crew, 1 Great Eagle. Equipment: The crew is armed with spear and bow. Special Rules: Flying Model, Impact Hits (D3+1), Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Repeater Bolt Thrower
unit.description: Warmachine: 2 High Elf Crew. Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Repeater Bolt Thrower, Speed of Asuryan.

unit.name: Great Eagle
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, March Blocker.

unit.name: Flamespyre Phoenix
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Dragon Fire, Demonic Ward Save (5+), March Blocker.

unit.name: Frostheart Phoenix
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Frost Aura, Demonic Ward Save (5+), March Blocker.

mount.name: Great Eagle
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, March Blocker. Note: Does not count against the number of Great Eagles in the army in regard to point costs!

mount.name: Griffon
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror

mount.name: Flamespyre Phoenix
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Dragon Fire, Demonic Ward Save (5+), March Blocker. Note: Does not count against the number of Phoenix in the army in regard to point costs!

mount.name: Dragon
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Scaly Skin (3+), Dragon Fire.

mount.name: Tiranoc Chariot
mount.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 2 Crew, 2 Elven Steeds. Equipment: The crew is armed with spear and bow. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1).

mount.name: White Lion Chariot
mount.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 2 White Lion Crew, 2 White Lions. Equipment: The crew is armed with great weapons. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1), Fear.

mount.name: Skycutter Chariot
mount.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 2 Crew, 1 Great Eagle. Equipment: The crew is armed with spear and bow. Special Rules: Flying Model, Impact Hits (D3+1).

mount.name: Frostheart Phoenix
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Frost Aura, Demonic Ward Save (5+), March Blocker. Note: Does not count against the number of Phoenix in the army in regard to point costs!

mount.name: Pegasus
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon Special Rules: Flying Model, March Blocker

item.name: Amulet of Fire
item.description: MR1

item.name: Amulet of Light
item.description: CC attacks of the bearer and his unit count as magical.

item.name: Annulian Crystal
item.description: In the enemy magic phase take one of your opponents PD and add it to your DD pool.

item.name: Armour of Caledor
item.description: 2+ AS, cannot be improved. If mounted, the model does not count as heavy cav.

item.name: Armour of Protection
item.description: Heavy armour, Ward Save (4+)

item.name: BM Arrow Attraction (6+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24". Units that attack the target unit with ranged attacks reroll failed to hit rolls. Lasts until the end of turn.

item.name: BM Courage of Aenarion (8+)
item.description: Augment, Range 12", unit is Stubborn until next casters magic phase

item.name: BM Drain Magic (8+)
item.description: In the next (enemy) magic phase, casters suffer -2 to cast BM spells. This effect stacks up to -6.

item.name: BM Fire Ball (5+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Flames of the Phoenix (13+)
item.description: Direct Damage, Range 18”, 5” template, S5, no AS. Target a point within the target unit. If the target point is out of range, the spell has no effect. If the target point is within range, place the template with its center over the target point and resolve it. A unit that suffers one or more casualties must take a panic test.

item.name: BM Fury of Khaine (9+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", 2D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Resurrection (9+)
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit gets D3 infantry models (US1) or 1 cavalry model (US2) back. Spell only works on unit type infantry and cavalry. Has no effect on character models. Units can only get models back up to the unit size they started the game with. Resurrected command group models return as common models of their unit.

item.name: Banner of Arcane Protection
item.description: MR2

item.name: Banner of Caledor
item.description: The unit is immune to Panic.

item.name: Banner of Ellyrion
item.description: The bearer and his unit suffer no movement penalty for difficult terrain.

item.name: Battle Banner
item.description: +D3 CR

item.name: Blade of Sea Gold
item.description: hits ignore armour saves

item.name: Bladedancer
item.description: Swordmasters are -1 to hit for shooting if the majority of the shooting unit is in the front zone of the Swordmaster unit. Although Swordmasters wield great weapons, they do not suffer from the always strike last rule. In addition, every Swordmasters that kills a model immediately gets to make one additional attack. Kills made by these bonus attacks do not trigger additional attacks.

item.name: Book of Hoeth
item.description: Once per HE magic phase, after the casting dice are rolled, but before a dispel attempt is made, the bearer of this item can roll an additional (free) PD and add the result to the casting roll (may cause IF or a miscast).

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Dragon Fire
item.description: Breath weapon, S4

item.name: Dragon Horn
item.description: All HE units reroll any rally or psychic test until the start of your next turn. Declare use at the start of your turn. One use only.

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS

item.name: Folraiths Robe
item.description: The bearer can only be hit by magical attacks. The bearer may not shoot or attack in cc.

item.name: Frost Aura
item.description: Enemy units in base contact with at least one model with this special rule suffers -1 to hit in cc. Only character models with the Frost Aura special rule are allowed to join units with the Frost Aura special rule. Units with Frost Aura are immune to these effects themselves.

item.name: Gauntlets of Chrace
item.description: +1 AS, Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Gem of Courage
item.description: The bearer and his unit take a break test with 3D6 choosing the 2 lowest dice. Declare use before taking the break test. One use only.

item.name: Gold. C. of Atrazar
Golden Crown of Atrazar
item.description: Ward Save (4+)

item.name: Golden Shield
item.description: Shield. Enemy must reroll successful hits in cc against bearer

item.name: Grace for Impact
Speed of Asuryan
item.description: All models of this unit that are attacked in their front are -1 to hit in cc in the turn the unit receives a charge. This modifier only applies if the unit was unengaged at the start of the turn. Character models do not pass this special rule to their mounts.

item.name: Guardian Phoenix
item.description: Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Healing Potion
item.description: Restores all wounds to starting level of bearer or character in btb. Can be used at the start of any phase in either players turn. One use only.

item.name: Helm of Fortune
item.description: Reroll failed armour saves

item.name: Ithilmar Banner
item.description: The unit does not suffer -1M from barding.

item.name: Jewel of the Dusk
item.description: +1 PD every magic phase which may only be used by the bearer.

item.name: Light Bolt Thrower
Light Bolt Thrower (Chariot)
item.description: Range 36", S5, penetrates ranks, no Stand & Shoot, Large Targets suffer 2 wounds, only one model is needed to operate the weapon, i.e. other models are free to use missile weapons in the shooting phase (but remember that the whole model has to shoot at the same target).

item.name: Lion Cloak
item.description: The model gets +1AS vs ranged attacks.

item.name: Lion Standard
item.description: The unit is immune to Fear and Terror

item.name: Loremaster
item.description: The model knows all spells of the Lore of White Magic. In each own magic phase, the model can try to cast up to 3 PM spells (power level 2) and up to 3 BM spells.

item.name: Martial Prowess
item.description: If this unit did not move in the movement phase, the unit attacks with an additional rank if it shoots or attacks an enemy in its front with spears. Cannot be used during a Stand & Shoot charge response.

item.name: Nagarythe Hatred
item.description: The unit hates all enemies.

item.name: PM Cure 2/7+
PM Cure 3/7+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target model recovers 1 wound

item.name: PM Divine Guidance 2/5+
PM Divine Guidance 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit rerolls to-hit rolls of natural 1s until the casters next magic phase

item.name: PM Shield of Saphery 2/6+
PM Shield of Saphery 3/6+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets a Ward Save (5+) until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Reaver Bow
item.description: Range 24", 3 shots at S4 AP(1), no modifiers for multiple shots

item.name: Repeater Bolt Thrower
item.description: Every time you like to fire this weapon choose one of the following fire modes: Single Bolt: Range 48", S6, no AS, D3 wounds, penetrates ranks Volley Shot: Range 48", S4, AP (1). Fires 5 shots that are resolved separately and suffer no penalty for multiple shots.

item.name: Sacred Incense
item.description: Units shooting at the bearer and his unit suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack.

item.name: Sigil of Asuryan
item.description: Dispel Scroll. On a 4+ BM / 5+ PM the spell is destroyed. One use only.

item.name: Spell Banner
item.description: The casting value of all spells (PM and BM) of any wizard in a unit with this banner is reduced by one (1) for as long as the respective wizard accompanies the unit.

item.name: Staff of Solidity
item.description: Immune to effects of first miscast (BM or PM)

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: Bearer gets +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Standard of Balance
item.description: Unit and any unit (friend or foe) in btb is Immune to Psychology. They also lose Hatred and Frenzy.

item.name: Standard of Refuge
item.description: The unit may reroll its flee distance.

item.name: Standard of the Everqueen
item.description: PM 3/9+, Resurrection spell, can only be cast at the bearers unit.

item.name: Star Lance
item.description: Lance. Can only be used while mounted. +3S and no AS on the charge.

item.name: Starwood Staff
item.description: Bearer gets +1 to cast (BM and PM)

item.name: Talisman of Saphery
item.description: Magic weapons of enemy models in BTB with the bearer count as mundane weapons of their kind, i.e. they lose all their magical special rules, as long as they stay in BTB with the bearer.

item.name: Upgrade: Scouts
item.description: Unit gains scouts special rule

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR
